full_threads.body:
Hi Jack, 

Thanks for submitting your request. Confirming we have now made the updates and they are ready for you to review. 

Here is the link: https://www.artisteplasticsurgery.com.au/press-magazines-radio/

Please let us know if you would like any further changes.

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Rica Rosario Valencia

I hope you're having a lovely week!

Please find attached a heavily embargoed PDF of the Beauty page that will run in this coming Sunday's edition of Body+Soul, featuring Dr Jack's quotes.

The page can be seen inside The Sunday Telegraph (NSW), Sunday Herald Sun (VIC), The Sunday Mail (QLD), Sunday Mail (SA) and Sunday Tasmanian (TAS) this weekend.

Kelsey x
